text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump GOP, Trump is thinking to ease the restrictions. Listen to your leader if you want to risk getting Coronavirus or spread it to your loved ones perhaps killing one of your family member or friends. We Democrats will stay put until it’s safe to go about doing our businesses.
